node_schema.title: Node
node_schema.description: A node in the map of crypto

uid.description: The unique ID of the primitive/scheme/assumption (random 32-bit unsigned integer)

display_name.description: The abbreviation or short name of the primitive/scheme/assumption

full_name.description: The complete name of the primitive/scheme/assumption

bibtex_ref.description: The canonical reference for this primitive/scheme (should be a bibtex string)

url.description: An Internet link to the canonical reference (un-paywalled if possible)

page_number.description: The page number (or theorem number) of the primitive/scheme in the reference (can be any type)

date_last_checked.description: The most recent time this node was checked

edge_schema.title: Edge
edge_schema.description: A (directed, typed) edge in the map of crypto

uid.description: The unique ID of the link between primitives (random 32-bit unsigned integer)

source_node.description: The input 'X' node uid of this relationship

dest_node.description: The output 'Y' node uid of this relationship

link_type.description: The type of relationship between these nodes

bibtex_ref.description: The canonical reference for this primitive/scheme (should be a bibtex string)

url.description: An Internet link to the canonical reference (un-paywalled if possible)

page_number.description: The page number or theorem of the primitive/scheme in the reference (can be any type)

date_last_checked.description: The most recent time this edge was checked
